name: Almond Bread
description: Almond Bread is an incredibly moist, incredibly easy sweet bread made with just a few staple ingredients in 5 minutes! No yeast required!
instructions: Grease 6 mini loaf pans and preheat oven to 350°F. Combine sugar, flour, baking powder and salt. Beat eggs, milk, oil and almond extract. Gradually add dry mixture to wet until just moist. Pour batter into pans an inch below to compensate for rise. Bake 40 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
